page.title: 10TOURISM.
page.content: In Newlyn there is a green where people can stroll or sit.There is also a beach.The beach is very pebbly and rocky and people do not normally go on it.Farther along the green there is a putting green and tennis courts where people can play.There is also a bowling club which people join.In Wherry Town there is a park which has a roundabout,swings and a climbing frame.Farther along people can play crazy golf and next to the crazy golf there is an amusement arcade.Then people can walk along the promenade to Penzance harbour.At the end of the "prom"there is an out door bathing pool which has sea water in it.People can walk around the side of the pool and can dive into the sea if they want to.
